result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sheldon Michael Henri

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Offer to Settle

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DA agreement as spelled out in offer to settle, comment other condition def to appr at court dates and provide truthful testimony. Def/Atty state this is the agreement. Plea NC to counts 1 and 3 in 17CF15. 16cM113 DRI. Counts 2 and 4 17CF15 DRI. Ct accepts pleas and finds guilty. Comments on sentencing. Ct1 $1000 plus costs $2586.15 DNR Ch 29 priv revoked unable to apply for new approvals for 3 years, firearm forfeited. Ct 3 sent WH prob 18 mo report DOC 24 hrs, NC David Gregoire, no dangerous weapon, couns, $567.63, DNA 7 days. As part of agreement when called upon truthful testimony (not part of probation part of agreement) $100 per month 1 mo from today, no gun no vote.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agreement to settle. need PLEAS date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 26, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. think there might be an agreement - would like a new STC date. Def has a job to go out of state. Bond amened to allow to go out of state. Def must appear in person.  Status conference scheduled for June 5, 2017 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty comments talk about things happing that might help the case, these things has happend. Tried to set up meeting with DA, but did not have time.  Status conference scheduled for May 16, 2017 at 10:10 am.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 2 cases. Atty Hoffmann request to come back in few weeks for STC  Status conference scheduled for April 10, 2017 at 01:45 pm. Cell phone 730-0260

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 16CM113 and 17CF15. Atty Hoffmann rec offer asks for another STC. Bail continues.  Status conference scheduled for March 20, 2017 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Prelim 17CF15 STC 16CM113. Waives right to prelim. Ct finds prob cause, case bound over. DA filed Information. Atty Hoffmann understands charges/penalties, waives reading and stands mute. DAP STC both cases  Status conference scheduled for February 27, 2017 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 17CF15 and 16CM113. Atty Hoffmann represents in both cases. Waives reading of complete and waives time limits for prelim and asks for scheduling of prelim. ADA asks for SB condition no firearm. $3000 SB no possession of firearm, go to ACJ for booking.  PH on felony case, STC other case as well  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 30, 2017 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court via phone with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DA comments new charges will be filed. DA comments would make sense to do all the cases together. Atty comments does not think  this will be trial. DEF needs to be here in person  Status conference scheduled for January 23, 2017 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty comments cas is getting old. Would like to take care of everything at once.  Status conference scheduled for December 21, 2016 at 11:15 am.
Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. No offer yet.  Authorization revoked.  Status conference scheduled for November 14, 2016 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Sheldon Michael Henri in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Hoffmann no agreement, has not received offer to settle.  Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2016 at 01:45 pm.
